name: Global congress on Catalysis and Chemical Engineering
content: The Iconic Meetings is happy to announce the First edition of the “Global Congress on Catalysis and Chemical Engineering” which is going to be scheduled on June 19-21, 2023 in Valencia, Spain (GCCCE-2023). Catalysis 2023 highlights the theme “Exploring the latest trends in Catalysis and Chemical engineering”. Catalysis Conference provides a worldwide stage for trading the most recent developments in the field of Chemical Engineering and offers opportunities to go to the presentations conveyed by eminent experts from everywhere throughout the globe. Participating in Catalysis Congress gives an approach to meet, cooperate with, and contact different specialists in your claim to fame region. Most meetings will have creators, and analysts, who are perceived specialists in the field. The catalysis 2023 conference unites people who have an enthusiasm for various fields of Chemical Engineering.
